DOC.brief_summary: This study compare revisional malabsorptive laparoscopic long limb gastric bypass ( VVLL RYGB ) primary VVLL RYGB test hypothesis one stag revisional laparoscopic VVLL RYGB safe effective procedure fail restrictive gastric banding .
DOC.brief_title: Revisional Versus Primary Roux-en-Y Gastric Bypass : Case Matched Analysis
DOC.criteria: Primary Gastric Bypass accord SMOB ( Swiss group study morbid obesity ) Guidelines Revisional Gastric Bypass fail Gastric Banding According SMOB Criteria
